attributes.action: Prevent the teaching of evolutionary mythology in ALL UK schools or teach all options.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prevent the teaching of evolutionary mythology in ALL UK schools.
Evolution is ONLY a theory and has NO proof. If evolution is taught then so should creation be, and an unbiased opinion would be to teach both.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
